version_name: 1.9.0• Three new heroes to be released in succession: » Draeznor

version_description:
• TWITCH integration! For the first time on a mobile MOBA, stream your battles to a live audience and interact with them, using the built-in support for camera, microphone and chat.
• Three new Heroes:
» Marithus – Fighter
» Donovac – Guard
